Name: Auto Kitchen
About the game: In Auto Kitchen you get to build your own automated kitchen and then chop, mash, fry, boil and bake ingredients into lots of delicious meals. You have full creative freedom to build however you like. Construct a simple system out of conveyor belts to move the ingredients around or if that's too slow for you, make use of all the wacky block types at your disposal such as Cannons , Trampolines and Portals to get that food moving fast! The only limit is your own imagination in this wacky world of crazy automated cooking !
